text: @SenSanders @SenSchumer What does the JFK Center of Performing Arts have to do with COVID19? $25m put on the backs of the American ppl and 99.9% of Americans will never attend. It’s just 1 more money laundering scheme by the Democrats. How much of the$25m will find it’s way as donations to Democrats?
